TEXT: The twin sisters from the Game Development Department. NL They stumbled upon an ancient game cartridge in the second-hand market, NL and during their gameplay, they were mysteriously transported into the game by a mysterious force.
You fire at that pulsating heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~\"Join~ ~us~ ~both ~of ~you, ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire.\"~
